item.title: CVE-2024-32442|2024-04-15T08:00:31.729Z -- Zoho Campaigns -- Zoho Campaigns
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Zoho Campaigns.This issue affects Zoho Campaigns: from n/a through 2.0.7.

item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Zoho Campaigns.This issue affects Zoho Campaigns: from n/a through 2.0.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-30239|2024-03-28T04:40:43.822Z -- Zoho Campaigns -- Zoho Campaigns
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Zoho Campaigns.This issue affects Zoho Campaigns: from n/a through 2.0.6.
